entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
